code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var stateSlice=createSlice({name:'chatPanel/state',initialState:false,reducers:{toggleChatPanel:function toggleChatPanel(state,action){return!state;},openChatPanel:function openChatPanel(state,action){return true;},closeChatPanel:function closeChatPanel(state,action){return false;}},extraReducers:{}});var _stateSlice$actions=stateSlice.actions,toggleChatPanel=_stateSlice$actions.toggleChatPanel,openChatPanel=_stateSlice$actions.openChatPanel,closeChatPanel=_stateSlice$actions.closeChatPanel;export{toggleChatPanel,openChatPanel,closeChatPanel};export var selectChatPanelState=function selectChatPanelState(_ref){var chatPanel=_ref.chatPanel;return chatPanel.state;};export default stateSlice.reducer;
